nodes.text: Poe Dameron 30 is the thirtieth, penultimate issue of the comic book series Star Wars: Poe Dameron. The comic was written by Charles Soule, illustrated by Angel Unzueta, and published by Marvel Comics on August 15, 2018.

"AWAKENINGS," PART FIVE! BLACK SQUADRON had its own mission during the events of THE LAST JEDI, a desperate trek across the galaxy to find aid for THE RESISTANCE, all without the help of their fearless leader, POE DAMERON. This is the beginning of the end.
